group_1.textLeft: Though it is only a guesthouse at the inn,@having a hot spring is wonderful～

group_1.textRight: It is a nice inn, isn't it?@The food is super delicious too♪

group_1.textLeft: The vegetables are especially fine.
Even the carrots have a lovely smell.@I'm quite amazed.

group_1.textRight: Everything here is home-grown.
The meat comes from animals hunted@up in the mountains.
It's what is called gibier cuisson, ehehe♪

group_1.textLeft: Speaking of hunting,@Rabi did say she wanted to get a license.

group_1.textRight: I do.
However, in my case it is not for a gun,@but for trap hunting.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...

group_1.textRight: ...Is there something on my face?

group_1.textLeft: I feel that the seasoning on the food at this inn@gives a rather calming feeling,
similar to the seasoning you use, Rabi.

group_1.textRight: Pfft.
No matter where you go or what you eat,@Lady Nayuta, everything tastes the same to you.

group_1.textLeft: I do not have a fool's taste!@I really mean it, too!

group_1.textRight: Well, I am from this town,@so it makes sense that the taste is similar.
That's the room phone, I will get it.

group_1.textLeft: What was that?

group_1.textRight: It seems your father has cancelled his reservation@to stay here tomorrow.

group_1.textLeft: WhaAATT!? It can't beー@Why would he!?

group_1.textRight: I did not go through the trouble of asking.@That was the only thing I was told.

group_1.textLeft: I will go ask the head of the inn why!

group_1.textRight: You will make a scene.

group_1.textLeft: I do not care if I do!

group_1.textRight: Um, why can't you just call your father directly?
Maybe he would tell you.

group_1.textLeft: I have no contact with him,@that is why I am searching for him!

group_1.textRight: Ohh...
Hey, maybe that's your father!

group_1.textLeft: That never...!@[chara:103701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103701:cheek_0][chara:103701:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:103701:lipSynch_1]...happens!?
What do I do!?@Do I look at this!?

group_1.textRight: You should look at it.
Yep, please hurry and read it.

group_1.textLeft: Sasha, you are just like a prophet.

group_1.textRight: It's a total coincidence♪

group_1.textLeft: Phew...

group_1.narration: Nayuta, I apologize for not contacting you@in such a long time.
I'm sure I've left you feeling lonely.@Your Papa's ego is the only thing@keeping me distant from you,@so I don't mind if you are angry with me.
Papa feels guilty for his selfishness,@but I've finally gotten time to settle down.@I will be meeting with my brother next,@so when that is over, let's meet again@and talk after all this time.
I have so much I want to tell you, Nayuta.

group_1.textCenter: Thank goodness...@The single thread I held onto did not snap...

group_1.textRight: This was for the best, right?@Rabi...

group_1.textLeft: The professor seemed to be in agreement.

group_1.textRight: Will you be there too, Rabi?

group_1.textLeft: A parent and his child together again after so long,@I would just be raining on their reunion...
...if I were there.@I will just say a few things briefly,
then while Lady Nayuta is enjoying herself,@I will take care of other errands.
